overview:
John Abernethy is most recently a managing director and founder of Dunrath Capital. There, he has been responsible for principal investing as well as overseeing the administrative and operational aspects of the Firm. He brings a wealth of experience as an operations-oriented executive with proven financial and transactional experience.

Mr. Abernethy has held senior executive positions in a variety of public and private companies in technology, outsourcing and publishing industries. Before Dunrath, he was the CFO of the Revere Group, a privately-held information systems technology integrator. He also served as CFO of APAC Customer Services, Inc. (NASDAQ: APAC) and as Executive Vice President and CFO of Commerce Clearing House, Inc. (NASDAQ: CCH), two publicly-traded corporations in the outsourcing and publishing industries. Earlier in his career, he was an audit partner at Deloitte & Touche, LLP.
